content:
# The furnace has successfully produced a total of 14 iron plates, but it is currently showing "NO_FUEL" and "NO_INGREDIENTS" status, indicating that it has run out of both coal and iron ore.
# Our current inventory is as follows:
# - 8 wood
# - 5 coal
# - 5 stone
# 
# To continue the factory setup, we need to gather more coal and iron ore. 

# Let's first focus on harvesting more coal. I will locate the nearest coal resource patch and gather more coal.
coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)
move_to(coal_position)  # Move to the nearest coal resource patch
harvest_resource(coal_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest another 10 coal

print(f"Inventory after harvesting coal: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
